mental_access_scores:mental_3sfca.long_name: Mental health services access score (3-step  floating catchment areas)
mental_access_scores:mental_3sfca.short_description: Index of mental health services accessibility based on supply and demand of facilities
mental_access_scores:mental_3sfca.long_description: Mental health services access score based on 3-step floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of facilities per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a facility is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for facilities (adult population).
mental_access_scores:mental_3sfca.statement: The mental health services accessibility score for {features.name} is {value}.
